title: The Oath Keeper's Wife: Stewart Rhodes Revealed
description:
Tasha Adams was married to Oath Keepers founder Stewart Rhodes, now charged with Seditious Conspiracy for his role in the January 6 insurrection. Tasha reveals the reality of her allegedly abusive, narcissistic husband, as she attempts to divorce the man who commands his own private army. And, she offers her prediction on whether Rhodes will cooperate with the government.

Follow Frank’s Guest:
Tasha Adams
https://twitter.com/That_Girl_Tasha

Follow Frank on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1
